reviewText: Fantastic film/documentary!  Award winning film about two brothers that escaped communist Cuba and their success in the US Baseball Major Leagues.  Sports Illustrated Documentary of the year!  Buy it before they run out.

I show this movie to my Spanish Culture and Civilization class every year. ESPN does a fantastic job with its documentaries (try "The Two Escobars" for another in the A+ ESPN 30/30 series. And I say all this as someone who knows so little about sports that I don't even know who's in the playoffs every year.

One of the best documentaries I've ever seen! It is on the edge of your seat exciting. I am a die-hard Cardinals fan and I don't like the Yankees on principle, but I begrudgling like them now that I know El Duque's story: an unbelievable quest to play the game he loved.
